name: Alessandro Desantis
bio: Alessandro Desantis is a Ruby developer and Director at Nebulab and is currently based in Rome, Italy. He has advised numerous start-ups on software architecture and organization design, and his work at Nebulab is focused on hiring and retaining happy development teams that deliver value. He is a contributor to the Solidus eCommerce framework, where he led various initiatives to increase contributions and improve the developer experience. In his spare time, he's a writer and a photographer, interested in the intersection of technology and art.
